title: CreativeInput
description: Unified creative input structure containing all fields needed for any ad format (weave, tail, product_card). Brand agents generate this structure, and operators transform it into format-specific creatives.

short_description.description: 1-2 sentence summary, max 200 characters, contextual to the query
short_description.example: CRM built for growing teams, with AI-assisted workflows.

long_description.example: Nimbus CRM Pro is designed for teams of 5-50 people who need intelligent pipeline management. It includes automated follow-ups, collaborative forecasting, and embedded AI copilots that help close deals faster.

value_props.description: Short value propositions or bullet points

context_snippet.description: 60-100 character contextual hint for weave format, making the ad relevant to the user's query
context_snippet.example: For startups needing higher limits and automated expense workflows.

cta_label.description: Call-to-action label, smart based on product (e.g., 'Start Free Trial', 'Request Demo', 'Learn More')

cta_url.description: Call-to-action URL, selected from available resource URLs based on query relevance

resource_urls.description: Destination or tracking URLs available for use

fallback_formats.description: Fallback ad formats if preferred format is not available

examples.short_description: CRM built for growing teams, with AI-assisted workflows.
examples.long_description: Nimbus CRM Pro is designed for teams of 5-50 people who need intelligent pipeline management. It includes automated follow-ups, collaborative forecasting, and embedded AI copilots that help close deals faster.
